snippet: The breast cancer charity Susan G. Komen for the Cure announced that a physician, Judith A. Salerno, would become its new president and chief executive.
abstract: Breast cancer charity Susan G Komen for the Cure announces that physician Judith A Salerno will become its new president and chief executive, succeeding Nancy Brinker.
lead_paragraph: The breast cancer charity Susan G. Komen for the Cure announced that a physician, Judith A. Salerno, would become its new president and chief executive.

keywords.value: Komen, Susan G, for the Cure
